description.value:
What the Character wears, availability depends on what they want.

Requirements

Baseline: Common Clothes: Abundant; Merchant Clothes: Average; Noble Clothes: Scarce Other examples: Rags, Coveralls, Bodygloves, Court Robes, Fine cloths, etc.

Effect: Special

Notes: Varies
